block.p: The Treasury's schedule of financings this week is confined to today's regular weekly auction of 3- and 6-month bills and a 52-week bill being auctioned tomorrow.

By the close of the New York cash market on Friday, traders said, the rate on the outstanding 3-month bill was 6.10 percent; a 6-month bill was 6.06 percent. The rate for the 52-week bill was 5.88 percent.
The Treasury's schedule of financings this week is confined to today's regular weekly auction of 3- and 6-month bills and a 52-week bill being auctioned tomorrow.

By the close of the New York cash market on Friday, traders said, the rate on the outstanding 3-month bill was 6.10 percent; a 6-month bill was 6.06 percent. The rate for the 52-week bill was 5.88 percent.
The following taxable and tax-exempt fixed-income issues are scheduled for pricing this week:
TAXABLE
ONE DAY DURING THE WEEK

(Source: MCM CorporateWatch)
